body: ## **2021 NBA Championship Odds** We were on the Celtics at yuge odds last year. 26-1. They got into +350. But why couldn't they show up for the Heat? Anyway, we'll be going again. We LOVE betting futures. In this piece you'll get access to all our futures picks, as well as our sexy graph showing the exact probabilities as the season unfolds. - - - ## **Expert Predictions** ### **Eastern Conference** The **Brooklyn Nets** are WAY too short. Terrible odds at 7-1 to win the chip. The culture killing Kyrie Irving plus a 7 foot scoring machine coming off an achilles. With or without James Harden, we'll be confidently betting around them. **Milwaukee** will shorten again. They hit approximately +250 last year and will shorten from 7-1 as the season plays out. But they still have that playoff failing stench, and it's reason to look wider. Next, at roughly 20-1, is the **76ers**, **Celtics** and **Heat**. We just can't have the Sixers. With or without Harden. Although we do love that Brett Brown has been sacked and Darryl Morey is there. But we always lean on the Celtics. We'll liekly fall into them again but stay tuned. Big ups to the Heat for their deep run last year and they do look over the odds again. - - - ### **Western Conference** The **Lakers** are a dominant favorite to go back to back. +300 is really, really short odds to win the title. You can't possibly back them right now as those odds will be around all season, or better. There's an opportunity cost to having your funds locked up. Check BTC growth in 2020 :). We're not saying the Lakers don't win but they aren't value at the current quote. We fell into the Clips last year but got burnt so can't make a strong case right now. Not with their offseason. The **Mavs** look juicy as who doesn't like betting on Luka? But the **Nuggets** are the clear value pick for us. 30-1 is big odds. We love that sytarting five and can see some extra punch coming from Michael Porter Jr. They're always underated too. We like the Nugs. - - - ## **Final Picks** We haven't pulled the trigger on any futures bets yet. Can't wait to bet around Brooklyn though. Some strong teams at 20-1 or better and this Covid-ish season will throw up some strange results. So we'll bet around the favorites early. Come back before the season starts for the hot mail. - - - #### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** #### **We promise it's worth your time.**
